forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to afternoon sunshine. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 48F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
